data.title: Star Progetti infrared electric heaters and modular screens
data.meta_description: Star Progetti is an international leader in the design and production of infrared heaters, modular screens and evaporative coolers.
data.text:
We have been implementing zoned microclimate solutions in environments in every sector for over 30 years. Our constant commitment to researching new technologies has enabled us to develop innovative products.

Research, innovation and sustainability are the values that we believe in. And we offer our experience to find the best solutions for efficiency and savings, both in energy and economically.

We are convinced that it is people who make the difference, in any situation. Our products are designed and manufactured by our team of experts, with the same passion for over 30 years.

We support local production and ingenuity. And we can proudly say that we have carried the Made in Italy flag to more than 60 countries around the world.

We firmly believe in research, certain that innovation and sustainability are fundamental values, at the service of people.
